description:
This tool allows users to install United States Department of Defense certificates into their Windows, Firefox, and Java certificate stores. The installed certificates are necessary for access to many U.S. DoD web sites, including those accessed from personally-owned equipment. Example sites include DISA Enterprise Email and Army Knowledge Online.

### Note

This package auto-detects whether to install the 32-bit or 64-bit version.
summary: Installs United States Department of Defense certificates to allow access to DoD web sites, including on personally-owned computers.
author: Defense Information Systems Agency
